metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12423 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Synapse before 0.31.2, unauthorised users can hijack rooms when there is no m.room.power_levels event in force.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-12423` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 0.31.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.31.2+dfsg-1').
